definitions.definition: A consonant sound formed by obstructing the airway , causing turbulence; a plosive , fricative , or affricate .
Anything that obstructs , especially in the passages of the body.

main_definition: ( phonetics ) A consonant sound formed by obstructing the airway , causing turbulence; a plosive , fricative , or affricate .
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) Anything that obstructs , especially in the passages of the body.
